data.lyric:
[ti:When It's Christmas]
[ar:张艺兴]
[al:When It’s Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]When It's Christmas - 张艺兴 (LAY)
[00:02.63]Lyrics by：Anthony Russo/DJ White Shadow
[00:05.27]Composed by：LAY(张艺兴)/DJ White Shadow/Pink Slip/Blanda/Anthony Russo
[00:07.91]Arranged by：LAY(张艺兴)/DJ White Shadow/Pink Slip/Blanda
[00:10.55]It's been a long year
[00:14.11]Working 9-5
[00:15.93]I meant to see you
[00:19.16]But I didn't have the time
[00:21.76]I've been so stressed out like every day and I don't even know why
[00:27.15]Just ups and downs the way life goes
[00:29.96]Could make you wanna cry
[00:32.87]January's just cold
[00:35.40]April's nothing but showers
[00:37.97]September means summer's over
[00:40.47]I've been counting down the hours
[00:43.02]Until Christmas
[00:45.91]Hanging lights up on the tree
[00:48.27]When it's Christmas
[00:51.07]Spending time with family
[00:53.64]On Christmas
[00:56.86]Magic's all around
[00:59.30]Snow is on the ground
[01:01.48]When it's Christmas
[01:14.44]Now it's the season
[01:17.05]Where we got twice the love to give
[01:19.78]A time for healing
[01:22.54]And turning strangers into friends
[01:25.83]We can stay inside by an open fire and kiss under the mistletoe
[01:31.49]Carols sung by a Children's choir
[01:33.94]Those melodies never get old
[01:36.66]January's just cold
[01:39.42]April's nothing but showers
[01:41.97]September means summer's over
[01:44.27]I've been counting down the hours
[01:46.87]Until Christmas
[01:49.93]Hanging lights up on the tree
[01:52.24]When it's Christmas
[01:54.91]Spending time with family
[01:57.51]On Christmas
[02:00.84]Magic's all around
[02:03.31]Snow is on the ground
[02:05.65]When it's Christmas
[02:19.24]If we spent more time together
[02:21.84]If we stayed in the giving mood
[02:26.12]If we left the tree up in the living room
[02:31.07]And kept the spirit of the season
[02:32.91]All year long the world
[02:37.74]We'd be a better place not just on
[02:43.35]Christmas
[02:45.88]Hanging lights up on the tree
[02:47.98]When it's Christmas
[02:51.04]Spending time with family
[02:53.63]On Christmas
[02:56.58]Magic's all around
[02:59.32]Snow is on the ground
[03:01.33]When it's Christmas
[03:26.47]Merry Christmas
data.trans:
[ti:When It's Christmas]
[ar:张艺兴]
[al:When It’s Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.63]//
[00:05.27]//
[00:07.91]//
[00:10.55]漫长的一年即将过去
[00:14.11]朝九晚五的忙碌着
[00:15.93]本打算去见你
[00:19.16]但我却没有时间
[00:21.76]每天我都筋疲力尽却不知道为何会这样
[00:27.15]人生本就起起落落 浮浮沉沉
[00:29.96]这让你不禁潸然泪流
[00:32.87]浓烈寒意的一月
[00:35.40]阴雨绵绵的四月
[00:37.97]九月意味着夏天即将落幕
[00:40.47]我已迫不及待倒数着
[00:43.02]圣诞节来临的那一刻
[00:45.91]彩灯挂满圣诞树的枝头
[00:48.27]圣诞佳节来临之时
[00:51.07]与家人共度
[00:53.64]在圣诞节那天
[00:56.86]空气中都充斥着节日的魔力
[00:59.30]地上落下片片雪花
[01:01.48]圣诞佳节来临之时
[01:14.44]现在是时候了
[01:17.05]我们付出双倍的爱
[01:19.78]是时候抚慰心伤了
[01:22.54]将不熟悉的陌生人视为自己的朋友
[01:25.83]我们可以围坐在屋内的炉火旁 在槲寄生下亲吻
[01:31.49]听着儿童合唱团演唱着圣诞颂歌
[01:33.94]那些旋律永远不会过时
[01:36.66]浓烈寒意的一月
[01:39.42]阴雨绵绵的四月
[01:41.97]九月意味着夏天即将落幕
[01:44.27]我已迫不及待倒数着
[01:46.87]圣诞节来临的那一刻
[01:49.93]彩灯挂满圣诞树的枝头
[01:52.24]圣诞佳节来临之时
[01:54.91]与家人共度
[01:57.51]在圣诞节那天
[02:00.84]空气中都充斥着节日的魔力
[02:03.31]地上落下片片雪花
[02:05.65]圣诞佳节来临之时
[02:19.24]如果我们愿意依偎共度
[02:21.84]如果我们一直怀揣着给予奉献的心情
[02:26.12]如果让象征着节日的圣诞树一直安放在家中
[02:31.07]那我们就能一直铭记这节日的精神
[02:32.91]整整一年 这世界
[02:37.74]将会变成美好的世界
[02:43.35]不仅仅是圣诞这一天
[02:45.88]彩灯挂满圣诞树的枝头
[02:47.98]圣诞佳节来临之时
[02:51.04]与家人共度
[02:53.63]在圣诞节那天
[02:56.58]空气中都充斥着节日的魔力
[02:59.32]地上落下片片雪花
[03:01.33]圣诞佳节来临之时
[03:26.47]圣诞快乐
